body: When deprived of magic, you fight harder. You gain a +1 trait bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls while within an area of antimagic such as that created by an antimagic field. You also gain this bonus for 1 round after you are subject to an area or targeted dispel magic spell, regardless of the effect's success or failure in dispelling your spells and magical effects.
name: Dispelled Battler
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Combat Traits/Dispelled Battler
